mapper.select: SELECT count(*) count FROM member WHERE memberno != 'admin'
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET pwd=#{pwd}, name=#{name}, dept=#{dept}, mobile=#{mobile}, email=#{email} WHERE memberno=#{memberno}
mapper.select: SELECT c.carno carno, c.cartype cartype, c.carstatus carstatus, c.carimg carimg, c.carname carname, r.memberno memberno, TO_CHAR(r.rentdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') rentdate, TO_CHAR(r.returndate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') returndate, r.rentno rentno FROM car c, rent r WHERE c.carno = r.carno and memberno = #{memberno}
